blueprint_book.label: [font=count-font][color=acid]Stackers[/color][/font]
blueprint_book.description:
These books contain [font=default-bold][color=white]Platforms[/color][/font] with integrated stackers allowing for trains to wait just outside the station while another is being loaded/unloaded.
To make this work, you want to set the train limit of the station to [font=default-bold]1+number of stacker bays[/font]

You can use these for double-headed trains too. You can also convert some bays into return track to retain the compactness of double-headed stations.
